name: Puka Shell Bangle 14kgf
description:
A puka shell glides around this 14k gold filled bangle.  Your 14k gold filled bangle will be polished smooth…or upon your request, will be textured to catch the sunshine.

This is for one 14k gold filled bangle.  The standard size is 8” around or 2 ½ inches in diameter and the puka shell is approximately ¾ inch in diameter.

To measure your size, the bangle needs to fit over your hand, so squeeze your thumb knuckle towards your pinky knuckle.  At the largest point around, this will be the size bangle that you wear.

I’m able to make your perfect size, please be sure to indicate your desired size in the buyers note upon purchase.

Extra Small 7 inches
Small 7½ inches
Medium 8 inches
Large 8½ inches
Little larger please 9 inches

14k gold – available upon request, please contact me for the price and to order.  Mahalo!

NOTE:  These pictures are sterling bangles, the gold-filled pictures were too blurry to post….but I wanted to get this listing up, as many hooululani fans have put in their requests (thank you!!!)

name: Puka Shell Bangle Sterling
description:
A puka shell glides around this sterling bangle.  Your sterling bangle will be polished smooth…or upon your request, will be textured to catch the sunshine.

This is for 1 sterling bangle.  The standard size is 8” around or 2 ½ inches in diameter and the puka shell is approximately ¾ inch in diameter.

To measure your size, the bangle needs to fit over your hand, so squeeze your thumb knuckle towards your pinky knuckle.  At the largest point around, this will be the size bangle that you wear.

I’m able to make your perfect size, please be sure to indicate your desired size in the buyers note upon purchase.

Extra Small 7 inches
Small 7½ inches

Large 8½ inches
Little larger please 9 inches

name: Puka Hoops
description:
One large puka shell on each hoop.

Length from top of earwire to bottom of puka shell is approximately 2½”.

I would be happy to adjust the hoop to your perfect size.  Contact me to discuss size and pricing.

Thank you for taking a look.

Aloha ♥

name: Glassy Hoops
description:
Recycled glass on sterling or 14k gold-filled hoops.

2¾” from top of earwire to bottom of hoop.  Hoop is 2¾” X 1½”.

All of these hoops are handformed and measurements are approximate.

Want larger or smaller hoops?  Not a problem.  To get in touch, click Contact Hooululani.

<3 & Aloha!

name: Dancing Star
description:
Sterling star dances whimsically on a filigree chain.  This star is both whimsical and elegant with its graceful lines.  One of my favorites.

16" with 2" extension
18” with 2” extension
Contact Hooululani (me) for more lengths.

name: Freshwater Pearls & Coral Hoops
description:
Freshwater pearls, coral and fine chain swing from the bottom of these hoops.

Hoops measure approximately 2” from the top of the earwire and 1 ¼" across.

I am happy to adjust the hoop size to your perfect size.  Contact me to discuss size and pricing.

Thank you for taking a look.

Aloha ♥

name: 5 Enchanting Pearls
description:
Black iridescent freshwater pearls adorn this 14k gold-filled necklace.  The textured chain is 24” and adjustable.  At the clasp you’ll find a 6th pearl that lays elegantly along your back.  As you adjust your necklace shorter, the pearl dangles lower along your back.  Ooh La!

This also doubles as a bracelet.  Wrap it around your wrist 3 times for a layered look.  Ooh La La!

name: Hoops & Recycled Glass
description:
Recycled glass on sterling or 14k gold-filled hoops.

4½” from top of earwire to bottom of chain.  Hoop is 1¾” X 1¼”.

All of these hoops are handformed and measurements are approximate.

Want larger or smaller hoops?  Not a problem.  To get in touch, click Contact Hooululani.

name: Large Hoops & Pearls & Strings
description:
Fresh water pearls adorn a variety of chain that swing from the top of these hoops.

Hoops measure approximately 3” from the top of the earwire and 2" across.

I am happy to adjust the hoop size to your perfect size.  Contact me to discuss size and pricing.

Thank you for taking a look.

Aloha ♥

name: Swinging Glass & Hoops
description:
Recycled glass swings on a delicate chain.  Choose from sterling or 14k gold-filled.

2½” from top of earwire to bottom of recycled glass.  Hoop is 1¾” X 1¼”.

All of these hoops are handformed and measurements are approximate.

Want larger or smaller hoops?  Not a problem.  To get in touch, click Contact Hooululani.

<3 & Aloha!

name: Graceful Swimmer ~ Jellyfish Earrings
description:
Large puka shells and ocean blue apatite make up this graceful swimmer.

They measure approximately 3” from the top of the earwire to the tip of the longest tentacle.  No vinegar needed for these beauties.  (Vinegar is used to take the edge off of a jellyfish sting.)

Thank you for taking a look.

Aloha ♥

name: Graceful Swimmer ~ Jellyfish Necklace
description:
A large puka shell and ocean blue apatite make up this graceful swimmer.

Pendant measures approximately 2¾” from the top  to the tip of the longest tentacle.  No vinegar needed for this beauty.  (Vinegar is used to take the edge off of jellyfish stings.)

Thank you for taking a look.

Aloha ♥

name: Blue ~n~ Ocean Teal Hoops
description:
Rich blue lapis and ocean teal apatite cascade these hoops.  These earrings radiate richness and tranquility.

Hoops measure approximately 2¾” from the top of the earwire and 1½" across.

I am happy to adjust the hoop size to your perfect size.  Contact me to discuss size and pricing.

Thank you for taking a look.

Aloha ♥

name: Shell & Agate
description:
This shell & agate necklace is sure to make a statement.  Whether paired with a sundress or work attire, empowering and sexy.

Measures 32", slips over your head.  Adjust the necklace so that the shell & agate sit side by side or spin the necklace around to wear asymmetrically.

Thank you for taking a look.

Aloha ♥

name: Hoops & Pearls
description:
Freshwater pearls and fine chain swing from the bottom of these hoops.

Hoops measure 2½” from the top of the earwire and 1¼" across.

All of these hoops are handformed and measurements are approximate.

Want larger or smaller hoops?  Not a problem.  To get in touch, click Contact Hooululani.

Aloha ♥

name: Dancing Sanddollars
description:
These natural sanddollars are dipped in a gold basemetal and dance sweetly on 14k gold-filled hoops.

Earrings are 3 inches in length, including the 14kgf earwire and 1¼ inches across.  The sanddollars are approximately ½ inch in diameter and vary slightly in size.

I would be happy to make the hoops larger or smaller, just click contact hooululani with your request.

name: Puka Shell Charm
description:
A lovely puka shell dangles alongside freshwater pearls, quartz & pineapple glass.  Swirly front clasp.

Necklace length is 18 inches, with a 3 inch drop.

name: Circle -e- Hoops
description:
Delicate circles of wire create these circle –e– hoops.

Each pair is handmade and may vary slightly from picture.  Approximately 1¾ inch diameter, 2 inches total including ear wire.

name: Love Knot
description:
A swirl of wire creates this sweet charm and will always remind you that you are loved.

Necklace is 16"
Charm is ½” X ¼”

Also pictured, circle-e-hoops.
http://hooululanijewelry.bigcartel.com/product/circle-e-hoops

name: Starfish & Peridot
description:
Peridot & aqua apatite rondelles give a splash of color to this sterling starfish necklace.  A great go to piece for some colorful whimsy and a summer feel all year long.

Available in 18" adjustable and 20" adjustable.

Want a different length, just contact hooululani.

Mahalo!

name: Simply Hoops
description:
These will be your go to hoops.  They go with everything, just grab and go!

Available in Sterling Silver or 14k gold-filled.

Sizes are approximate, from top of earwire to bottom of hoop.  If you would prefer another size it can be customized just for you.

Small 1½"
Med 2" (pictured)
Lg 2½"

These are a light guage...making them in a heavier guage & hammered.  Find them now, in boutiques that sell Hooululani.  I will be posting them on this website soon.  Feel free to contact me for a sneak peek.

name: Dangle Rings
description:
These rings are fun to wear and you get to choose your own dangles.

To create your ring:
1st choose a 14k gold-filled or sterling silver ring.

Ring size - when placing your order, list your ring size in instructions to seller.  If you miss that step, just contact me, easy peasy.

2nd choose a charm.

Charms Currently Available:
black freshwater pearl
white freshwater coin pearl
puka shell
paua disc
paua square

If you wish to add more than one charm, there is another listing for Dangles Galore.

I will be adding more charms to the list, but if you have a gemstone in mind or want a different color freshwater pearl or even crystals for some sparkle, please contact me.

These are fun to wear and fun to give…enjoy creating your very own!

name: Dangles Galore
description:
These are additional charms for your Dangle Ring.  I will assemble your ring and your personal design will be ready to wear upon arrival.

Charms Currently Available:
black freshwater pearl
white freshwater coin pearl
large puka shell
3 small puka shells

Charms are $5 each.

I will be adding more charms to the list, but if you have a gemstone in mind or want a different color freshwater pearl or even crystals for some sparkle, please contact me.

See Dangle Ring to purchase a ring for these charms.

name: Zebra Shell & Hoop
description:
Shiny sterling hoops frame the dangling garnets & pyrene.

Approximate length from top of sterling silver earwire to end of pyrene is 2½"

Larger or smaller hoops are possible, just contact hooululani.

Aloha!

name: Champagne & Pearls
description:
Black iridescent freshwater pearls & champagne citrine marry beautifully on these 14k gold-filled earrings.  

2 ¼” from top of earwire to bottom of champagne citrine.  Lengths are approximate and can be customed to your perfect length.  Just click Contact Hooululani to request another length.

Mahalo!

name: Coral & Turquoise Hoops
description:
Red coral, turquoise & a vermeil leaf swing on a 14k gold-filled hoop.

2¾” from top of earwire to bottom of leaf charm.  Hoop is 1¾” X 1 ¼”.

All of these hoops are handformed and measurements are approximate.

Want larger or smaller hoops?  Not a problem.  To get in touch, click Contact Hooululani.

Luv & Aloha!

name: Starfish Lariet
description:
A sterling starfish charm swims fancily with a freshwater coin pearl and aquamarine nugget.

Length shown 16".
Other lengths available...see drop down.

name: Pink Charm
description:
Pink topaz, champagne citrine, garnet & a vermeil sanddollar swing charmingly from this 14k gold-filled necklace.

18” front clasp.  Length from top of circle to end of pink topaz briolette is 2 ¼”

Select your length 16" to 20" at no additional charge.

name: Embrace Summer
description:
Freshwater pearls & Swarovsky crystal sparkle on these 14K gold-filled hoops.

Total length including earwire and crystal starfish is 2½ ”.  On the other side, total length is 3½”.

name: All Around Town Hoops
description:
These 14k gold-filled hoops go with everything.  They'll go with you, UptowN, Downtown and All arounD tOwn.

1”X ¾” hoops, flattened on the bottom for some character.  Why?  That was my mood that day.  Sizes vary ever so slightly.  Will custom other sizes for you.  Click Contact Hooululani.

Warm Aloha!

name: Puka on Filigree
description:
A large puka shell sits fancily on a sterling filigree chain.  Fanciful and organic, my favorite combination.

Puka shell is approximately ¾”.  Sizes & shapes will vary slightly due to its natural origin.  Filigree chain is 16” with a 2” extension.  Interested in another length, please contact Hooululani

Love & Aloha!

name: Golden Lariet
description:
Citrine & pineapple glass brighten this golden lariet.

18" around to front clasp.  Total length including the gemstone dangles is 20".

Need it shorter or longer....contact hooululani.

xo

name: Hello Sunshine
description:
Lemon quartz nugget on vermeil hammered ring.

14k gold-filled chain is 18”
Ring & quartz drop is 1 ¾”

name: Hello Sunshine Bracelet
description:
Lemon quartz nuggets & vermeil hammered rings make up this chunky bracelet.

Length 8”

Also pictured, Hello Sunshine Necklace.
http://hooululanijewelry.bigcartel.com/product/hello-sunshine-necklace

name: White Pearls & Filigree
description:
White freshwater coin pearls swing beautifully at the end of 3 sterling filigree swirls.  Lovely enough for your wedding and simple enough for everyday after that, a piece to cherish.

2½” including sterling earwire.  

Contact Hooululani to request longer or shorter.  I'd be happy to make it a perfect length for you!

name: Pearls & a Wish
description:
White freshwater coin pearls swing from sterling wish earwires.  Simply.Lovely.Cherish.Forever

Total length is 2¼”.

name: And then there were 3
description:
3 sterling silver hammered rings in a row.  Originally gifted to a dear friend, representing each of her 3 beautiful children.  It also represents mommy, daddy & me make 3…it's perfect, for giving (or keeping!)

3 rings in a row measure 1 ½”.

name: Dainty Circles
description:
3 delicate circles available in 14k gold-filled or sterling silver.

To zoom in on the pictures, use the + in the top left corner.

name: Blue Skies
description:
Aquamarine nugget on chunky sterling silver chain.

18” total, front clasp.

Crystal quartz also available.

name: Blue Skies Bracelet
description:
Aquamarine nugget on sterling silver.  Accented with apatite and a freshwater coin pearl.  Finished off with a swirly clasp.

8" total.  I'm happy to adjust to your perfect size.  Just contact Hooululani.

name: Fly High Dragonfly
description:
Sterling dragonfly slides on a sterling necklace that glistens & sparkles to every mermaids delight!  

Dragonfly is just under a ½”  (approximately 1cm)
Swarovsky crystal accent at clasp.

Choose from 15" or 16” sterling diamond cut bead chain

Need a different length?  Simply Contact Hooululani.  

Initial Love Personalized Disc Necklace sold separately.

name: Swimming Starfish
description:
Your adorable mermaid will love this Starfish Necklace.  (How cute is she?!)

Sterling starfish & aqua gemstone (apatite) swim happily together on a 16" sterling necklace, adjustable.

name: Initial Love
description:
Personalize a necklace for every little mermaid in your ocean.  ½” sterling disc is handstamped with any initial and hangs next to a Swarovsky crystal attached to an open heart.

The 15” or 16” sterling diamond cut bead chain glistens & sparkles like fairy dust.  

Swarovsky crystal accent at clasp.

When you place your order, please let me know which initial & color crystal or pearl you want.

If you prefer a different length, simply Contact Hooululani.  

Fly High Dragonfly necklace is sold separately.
